metadata.description: Physical & Environmental Protection - Physical security (limited AWS applicability) - MAPPED

controls.Name: PE-1-description - Policy and Procedures

details: Develop and document physical and environmental protection policy and procedures
Establish physical and environmental protection roles and responsibilities
Define physical and environmental protection processes and workflows
Create physical and environmental protection documentation and templates
Establish policy review and update processes

controls.notes: AWS functions support policy and procedures through physical security monitoring, access control, and compliance management capabilities

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of physical security compliance and controls
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced physical security monitoring for PE-1 and PE-3 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of physical access and security incidents

new_functions_suggested.description: Comprehensive logging of physical access activities

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated physical access control and authorization management
